name: Auto Crossbow
author: Mero
info: Automatic Crossbow Script for your all your needs.
description: This causes link to shoot arrows rapidly as he holds the fire button.
setup: Create a bow and set it's power and level as usual. Set D0 to 1 for it to be treated as an autobow.Then open up all the arrow items in the editor and add the AutofireBow item script.Attribute 0: Firing RateAttribute 1: SpriteAttribute 2: Item ID
